name: Boogie Beat Brawlers
description:
Boogie Beat Brawlers: the game where you need to match the beat to your lethal feet. Navigate the dance floor in time with the beat to take down your opponents with your electric dance moves! Shoot, smack and use powerful abilities to be the very best Boogie Beat Brawler

We've updated Boogie Beat Brawlers to Alpha V.03! This features:

  • An entirely new level, Da Streets, in which players must dance along to a super-fast beat and avoid cars passing through.
  • New powerup, Goofy Foot: All other players are briefly disoriented and have inverted movement
  • Powerup balancing
  • Enhanced UI
  • Enhanced dance floor effects
  • Beat matching accuracy points
  • Bug fixes 

We recommend using gamepads with rumble for the best experience. Note: to start game using keyboard press ESC
